approve(address,uint256).details: prefer ERC20Extended functions to avoid transaction-ordering vulnerability (see https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/20#issuecomment-263524729)

params.amount: quantity of tokens approved for spending

returns._0: success status (always true; otherwise function should revert)

params.receiver: recipient of shares resulting from deposit
recipient of shares resulting from deposit
recipient of shares resulting from deposit

params.owner: holder of shares to be redeemed
holder of shares to be redeemed

params.receiver: recipient of shares resulting from deposit

params.owner: holder of shares to be redeemed
params.receiver: recipient of assets resulting from withdrawal

returns._0: success status (always true; otherwise function should revert)

params.holder: holder of tokens prior to transfer

returns._0: success status (always true; otherwise function should revert)

params.owner: holder of shares to be redeemed
params.receiver: recipient of assets resulting from withdrawal

allowance(address,address).notice: query the allowance granted from given holder to given spender

approve(address,uint256).notice: grant approval to spender to spend tokens

asset().notice: get the address of the base token used for vault accountin purposes

balanceOf(address).notice: query the token balance of given account

convertToAssets(uint256).notice: calculate the quantity of assets received in exchange for a given quantity of shares, not accounting for slippage

convertToShares(uint256).notice: calculate the quantity of shares received in exchange for a given quantity of assets, not accounting for slippage

decimals().notice: return token decimals, generally used only for display purposes

deposit(uint256,address).notice: execute a deposit of assets on behalf of given address

maxDeposit(address).notice: calculate the maximum quantity of base assets which may be deposited on behalf of given receiver

maxMint(address).notice: calculate the maximum quantity of shares which may be minted on behalf of given receiver

maxRedeem(address).notice: calculate the maximum quantity of shares which may be redeemed by given holder

maxWithdraw(address).notice: calculate the maximum quantity of base assets which may be withdrawn by given holder

mint(uint256,address).notice: execute a minting of shares on behalf of given address

previewDeposit(uint256).notice: simulate a deposit of given quantity of assets

previewMint(uint256).notice: simulate a minting of given quantity of shares

previewRedeem(uint256).notice: simulate a redemption of given quantity of shares

previewWithdraw(uint256).notice: simulate a withdrawal of given quantity of assets

redeem(uint256,address,address).notice: execute a redemption of shares on behalf of given address

totalAssets().notice: get the total quantity of the base asset currently managed by the vault

totalSupply().notice: query the total minted token supply

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).notice: transfer tokens to given recipient on behalf of given holder

withdraw(uint256,address,address).notice: execute a withdrawal of assets on behalf of given address
